definition: property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: The obvious solution is a property tax.
sentences.chinese: 明显的解决方案是开征物业税。

sentences.english: My apartment house's service department did not return calls.
sentences.chinese: 而我们物业的报修处一直不回电话。

sentences.english: Thus, before the property management of residence turned off the valve, my grandmother's house was flooded.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，在物业把总阀门关掉之前，姥姥家发大水了。

sentences.english: Hereafter the rental properties are redelivered and reprocessed.
sentences.chinese: 此后的出租物业交还和重新处理。

sentences.english: Ask to be with Tony Leung's joint property?
sentences.chinese: 问到可有跟梁朝伟的联名物业？

sentences.english: Please be informed that Property Management Company is conducting continuously HVAC conversion works to CCP.
sentences.chinese: 物业公司正在陆续对园区各楼进行空调转换工作。

sentences.english: In addition, this is the first time such property costs have experienced an annual dip in 19 months.
sentences.chinese: 此外，这也是19个月来物业费首次出现年度下降。

sentences.english: Housing occupancy standards fall short, the right not to pay the property management fee?
sentences.chinese: 达不到入住标准的房，物业管理费有权不交吗？

sentences.english: Francis Hu, Senior Executive Director of Property Investment of Ping An Trust & Investment Co.
sentences.chinese: 胡宁，现任平安信托物业投资部高级投资执行总监。

sentences.english: The extension has ample glazing, and overlooks a verdant courtyard at the property's centre.
sentences.chinese: 扩展部分有足够的玻璃窗，俯瞰物业中心青翠的庭院。

sentences.english: Property laid out on an 11x17 sheet at different scales.
sentences.chinese: 物业表列出了在不同规模11x17。

sentences.english: Hengda property, gold property, I would like to note life with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 恒达物业，金牌物业，谨以微笑注解风华人生。

sentences.english: Hengda property, gold property, I would like to note life with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 恒达物业，金牌物业，谨以微笑注解风华人生。

sentences.english: A:Sam,Mr.Chen has recently bought a flat in Tai Koo Shing.
sentences.chinese: 森，陈先生最近买了太古城一个住宅物业。

sentences.english: The bid-invitation of preliminary realty management shall be organized and implemented by the bid inviter.
sentences.chinese: 前期物业管理招标由招标人依法组织实施。

sentences.english: But the estate management is not merely managed , still managing and service.
sentences.chinese: 但物业管理不仅仅是管理，还有经营和服务。

definition: property management/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3]
developer (of real estate, a commercial product etc)
parking spot/unloading point/garage place/stand for taxi
Vanke, large Chinese real estate company, founded in 1984
